thread.title: Michigan State gives injured senior final chance to play
thread.title_full: Michigan State gives injured senior final chance to play

title: Michigan State gives injured senior final chance to play
text:
Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email Michigan State gives injured senior final chance to play What a moment. Post to Facebook Michigan State gives injured senior final chance to play What a moment. Check out this story on USATODAY.com: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/michigan-state-eron-harris-season-ending-injury-senior-night-checked-in-wisconsin-tom-izzo Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Nation's Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Michigan State gives injured senior final chance to play Andrew Joseph 7:03 p.m. ET Feb. 26, 2017 
Michigan State senior guard Eron Harris suffered a season-ending injury in the Spartans' loss at Purdue last week. The knee injury ended his college career, but Michigan State gave him one final opportunity to take the floor at the Breslin Center on Sunday. 
Late in Michigan State's win over Wisconsin, head coach Tom Izzo told Matt McQuaid to travel with 3.2 seconds remaining, allowing Harris to take the floor to a standing ovation. Eron Harris checking in on Senior Night despite season ending injury. Touching. pic.twitter.com/zYpZDy1Toa — Zachary Barnes (@Forrest_Barnes) February 26, 2017 
With a brace on his knee, Harris went to midcourt and kissed the logo. Eron Harris kisses the 'S' on Senior Day pic.twitter.com/2Upgoga0qp 
It was a phenomenal moment. 
Harris' mother performed the national anthem before the game, which also brought the senior to tears. Injured @MSU_Basketball senior Eron Harris gets emotional as mom sings National Anthem. pic.twitter.com/epfDYivZBK — Michigan St. on BTN (@MichiganStOnBTN) February 26, 2017 
It doesn't get much better than that. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/michigan-state-eron-harris-season-ending-injury-senior-night-checked-in-wisconsin-tom-izzo Most Popular
